CharAtString

This component outputs the character at the specified index [In] of the input string [In] when triggered by the input event. If the specified index [In] is less than 0 or is greater than the length of the string minus 1, an empty string is presented to the output [Out]. Note that an index of 0 specifies the first character in the string.

Ports

  • [In] :

    Data input.

  • [In] :

    Data input, specifies the index of the input string [In] to be returned.

  • [Out] :

    Data output.

  • [In] :

    Input event, triggers the character at index [In] to be presented to the output [Out].

  • [Out] :

    Output event.

Parameters

None.

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
